p: Hill et al. [ 16] investigated the stability constants (Kc) of trans-cinnamaldehyde/β-cyclodextrin inclusion complexes at three different temperatures (25, 35, and 45 °C), the KCs of inclusion complexes were 28.47, 19.06, and 18.41 L/mol, respectively; the thermodynamic results revealed that trans-cinnamaldehyde/β-cyclodextrin inclusion complex formation was a typical lower energy reaction.
